metadata.Title: CVE-2017-8872 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
The htmlParseTryOrFinish function in HTMLparser.c in libxml2 2.9.4 allowsattackers to cause a denial of service (buffer over-read) or informationdisclosure.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-8872` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxml2 - 2.9.4+dfsg1-6.1ubuntu1
libxml2-utils - 2.9.4+dfsg1-6.1ubuntu1
python-libxml2 - 2.9.4+dfsg1-6.1ubuntu1
python3-libxml2 - 2.9.4+dfsg1-6.1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libxml2 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.9.4+dfsg1-6.1ubuntu1').
